metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000368 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Todd Miller's sudo version 1.8.20p1 and earlier is vulnerable to an inputvalidation (embedded newlines) in the get_process_ttyname() functionresulting in information disclosure and command execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000368` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.6
sudo-ldap - 1.8.16-0ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.16-0ubuntu1.6').
